sentences.sContent: The carpentry and soldier demand constraints are similar.
sentences.sContent_eng: The carpentry and soldier demand constraints are similar.
sentences.sCn: 木工和士兵的需求约束是类似的。

sentences.sContent: Oh wait, that is for carpentry, but nonetheless it works here as well!
sentences.sContent_eng: Oh wait, that is for carpentry, but nonetheless it works here as well!
sentences.sCn: 哦，等等，这是对木工而言的！ 没错，但是它在这里也很适用！

sentences.sContent: A train requires 1 hour of finishing labor and 1 hour of carpentry labor.
sentences.sContent_eng: A train requires 1 hour of finishing labor and 1 hour of carpentry labor.
sentences.sCn: 一辆火车需要 1 小时的修整工劳动和 1 小时的木工劳动。

synos.tran: 木器；木工手艺；[木]木工业

trans.tranOther: the skill or work of a carpenter
